S = input()
T = input()
print(S == T[:-1] ? 0 : "NO")
N, K = map(int, input().split())

if N % K == 0:
    print(0)
else:
    print(min(N % K, K - (N % K)))

S = input()
T = input()
if S == T[:-1]:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')


N, K = map(int, input().split())  # N and K input

if N % K == 0:  # if N is divided by K
    print(0)
else:
    print(1)
N, K = map(int, input().split())
if N % K == 0:
    print(0)
else:
    print(min(N % K, K - (N % K))
N, K = map(int, input().split())

print(1 if N % K != 0 else 0)

N, K = map(int, input().split()) # N and K input

print(1 if N % K else 0)
N, K = map(int, input().split())

if N % K == 0:
    print(0)
else:
    print(1)
